overview: The Hybrid Cloud Management Solution integrates on-premises resources with Azure services, leveraging Azure Arc for management and Azure Kubernetes Service for container orchestration. The architecture emphasizes security through a corporate firewall, Azure Key Vault, and Microsoft Defender for Cloud, ensuring robust data protection and compliance.

components.name: Control Plane
components.description: Manages Azure services and resources, providing a unified interface for management.
security_considerations: Access restricted to authorized personnel only.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest and in transit is encrypted.
vulnerabilities: Potential misconfiguration leading to unauthorized access.

components.name: Azure Local Instance
components.description: Hosts traditional applications and Azure Arc-enabled services for hybrid management.
security_considerations: Isolated network segment for sensitive applications.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest is encrypted using BitLocker.

components.name: Arc VMs
components.description: Virtual machines managed through Azure Arc, enabling hybrid capabilities.
security_considerations: Use of Azure Security Center for threat detection.
components.encryption_status: VM disks encrypted with Azure Disk Encryption.
vulnerabilities: Misconfigured security groups leading to exposure.

components.name: Hyper-V
components.description: Virtualization technology for running virtual machines.
security_considerations: Isolation of VMs to prevent lateral movement.
components.encryption_status: VMs can be encrypted using BitLocker.

components.name: Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
components.description: Container orchestration service for deploying and managing containerized applications.
security_considerations: Network policies to restrict pod communication.
Use of Azure Policy for governance.
components.encryption_status: Secrets stored in Kubernetes are encrypted.

components.name: Storage Spaces Direct (S2D)
components.description: Storage solution for high availability and performance.
security_considerations: Data redundancy and replication for high availability.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest encrypted with Storage Service Encryption.
vulnerabilities: Potential data loss if not properly configured.

components.name: Switch/Router/Firewall
components.description: Manages East/West traffic between local machines and ensures security.
security_considerations: Intrusion detection and prevention systems in place.
components.encryption_status: Traffic encryption using VPNs where applicable.

security_risks: Potential interception if not properly secured.
Unauthorized access if RBAC is misconfigured.
Data leakage if container security is not enforced.
